resource_name: Virginia Pathogen Genomics Center of Excellence
resource_description: The Department of General Services (DGS) Division of Consolidated Laboratory Services (DCLS) and partners at the Virginia Department of Health (VDH), University of Virginia (UVA) School of Medicine (SOM) and Biocomplexity Institute (BI), and Virginia Commonwealth University (VCU) are working together as the Virginia Pathogen Genomics Center of Excellence (VA PGCoE) to further advance the utilization of genomic technologies in public health.
